Understand whether the author of the text expresses one of the following emotions: Love, Joy, Sadness or Anger.

✔ Communication Style
Understand the author’s communication style, be it action-seeking, fact-oriented, self-revealing, or information-seeking.

✔ Personality Traits
Understand whether an author is emotional or rational, based on his or her content and writing style.

✔ Aspect Based Sentiment Analysis
Target specific subjects of interest and the sentiments that your users display towards them.

With this extension, you can analyze online reviews, chat messages, support tickets, emails, and much more. Our unique combination of psychology and AI enables the deepest level of understanding of not only what someone is saying, but how they say it. Decode the communication characteristics of the message and engage with the author in the right way.

We designed AI-Powered Text Insights with simplicity in mind. It is compatible with almost all text, regardless of source, including web apps such as Trello or Slack, social networks such as Facebook or Linkedin, review sites such as Tripadvisor or Yelp, online e-mail services such as Gmail, and much more.

This extension uses Symanto's Psycholinguistic Text Analytics API. More information about this API and access to a free API key can be found on https://www.symanto.com/api/

Your privacy is important to us: by default, this extension will check your text by sending it to https://developer.symanto.net over a securely encrypted connection. No account is needed to use this extension.

List of supported languages: English, German and Spanish

★★★ GET IN TOUCH ★★★
https://www.symanto.com/get-in-touch/
Web: https://www.symanto.com
Facebook https://www.facebook.com/SymantoAI/
Twitter @SymantoAI

name: Notify Me!
description: Stop wasting your time, reloading pages and being busy concerned about comments/announcements while the contest is running. Relax and let this extension notify you as soon as possible in pop-up messages.

name: Aidodys
description:
Découvrez la Pastille Aidodys ! Adaptez vos pages web en 3 clics en fonction de vos difficultés de lecture !
Profitez d'une lecture plus rapide, plus compréhensible et moins fatigante !

Aidodys est une plateforme d’aide à la lecture permettant d’adapter tous types de documents et des pages web.
La pastille aidodys permet d’adapter des pages web en fonction du profil de lecture
Créez votre profil de lecture dans notre application et retrouvez le directement dans la Pastille Aidodys !

Vous bénéficiez de 10 jours d’essai pour tester toutes nos services :
- Plateforme web

- Pastille Aidodys

Pour vous inscrire rendez-vous sur : https://new.aidodys.com/welcome

name: AiK Seo bar
description:
Добавляет нумерацию к SERP Яндекса и Google, подсвечивает rel=nofollow и ссылки в блоках noindex. Позволяет передавать адрес текущей страницы или домена на анализ в различные сервисы, как то:
SimilarWeb
MegaIndex
Be1
Google Page Speed
а так же позволяет проверить присутствие страницы в индексе Яндекса или Гугля, или получить список всех проиндексированных страниц домена.

name: AIMS-Helper
description:
Help students to calculate their GPA and create an unofficial summary.

You can also calculate which courses you want to select for calculation.

name: AIMWARE Essentials
description:
Adds extra features to AIMWARE.net forum, specifically:

Features:
- Change forums themes, there are currently 2 third-party themes.
- Set image and video background to the forum.
- Change shoutbox height for easier reading and block offensive user messages by their username.
- Mark all forums read with one simple click. Requires mybb_post_key defined in settings.
- Import and Export settings in clipboard to share them across devices or friends.

name: ainsanity
description:
I'm putting forward a motion to replace the terms **Artificial Intelligence** and **AI**, with **Automated Software System** and **ASS**.

Here is a cross-browser WebExtension which does exactly that on any webpage.

Basically, I was getting a bit tired of constantly reading "*XYZ use **an Artificial Intelligence** to do ABC*". It's paritcularly annoying when used as a noun, e.g. **The** Artificial Intelligence ..., **My** AI ..., **An** AI ..., etc.

Longer rant at
https://memoakten.medium.com/artificial-intelligence-as-the-name-of-a-research-field-vs-a-characteristic-of-being-920cb5f3361e

Source at https://github.com/memo/ainsanity-webextension

name: AIO APK Downloader
description:
Best APK Downloader for Firefox (Download APK, OBB and Bundles package) - APKSSL.com

Best APK Downloader for Firefox.
ALL IN ONE APK DOWNLADER
Features in first version:
+ Auto Replace "Install" button on Google play
+ Download with our random device, no need your device or any permissions
+ Download APK with OBB and Bundles package
For setting you can using online version at https://apkssl.com/aio-apk-downloader/
Please like & share if it's usefull.
Thanks!

name: AIO Search Toolbar
description:
AIO Search Firefox Toolbar is a handy Firefox add-on that provides you with an enhanced toolbar for searching on the web by categories, and display results in tabs on one page through www.aiosearch.com website.

You can search multiple search engines grouped by category which appears on the toolbar menu as horizontal tabs, or search single search engine. All categories and engines are editable and sortable through the drag and drop form. Site list is auto-updated keeping you up-to-date with the best search sites available.

A lot of accessible tools have been added to the toolbar to make it easy to make your search like 'keyword highlighter', 'keyword auto-complete' and context menu options.

Features :
Search sites list by category and open them all on www.aiosearch.com tabs.
Add your own search engines or category.
Personalized site list and categories saved to your www.aiosearch.com account.
Flexible popup menu width to fit screen width and to give user more space to choose from sites.
Arrange Sites list and categories with easy drag and drop form.
Easy show/hide icon for the dockable toolbar.
integrated Firefox auto-complete search keywords.
Context menu search option for the selected text on the page.

name: Aiondestiny achievement timer
description: Дополнение исправляет отображение обратного отчета до обнуления достижений на aiondestiny.im в личном кабинете

name: AIPD - Adless Instagram Photo Downloader
description:
Установив дополнение вы сможете скачивать фото из Instagram без мороки, просто правой кнопкой по фото. ( Для этого открой фото в большом виде и подождите пока страницу полностью загрузится )
Adds ability to download photos from Instagram by right click context menu. ( You should open photo page for this and wait until page is loading )

name: Airbnb Price Per Night Corrector
description:
Ever get sick of Airbnb showing you the price per night of a listing and NOT including the taxes and fees in that nightly price? It's misleading, right? No one likes the feeling of getting nickeled and dimed when they're trying to book lodging, especially when those extra fees can make a massive difference in the price per night of the stay. This extension fixes all of that and will hopefully protect you from being fooled into paying more per night of your Airbnb stay than you had originally planned. It will show you the all-in price per night of any Airbnb listing.

Note: USD, EUR, and GBP are the only officially supported currencies at the moment. English and French are the only supported languages.

name: AirCare Lite
description: This is the Lite version of AirCare, for the full experience, download the AirCare app for your Android or iOS device: https://getaircare.com

name: Airparts Assistant
description:
View Airparts products through other Aviation websites.

Airparts Assistant inserts helpful links into Aviation websites and your browser to help you find the part you're looking for with Airparts. It also provides a shortcut to use our search engine!

Features:
- Browse growing collection of helpful product guides and supported sites
- Search our site from anywhere on the web
- Right click or highlight a part number and hit "Search Airparts" to quickly view the part on our site
- Copy a part number and hit the paste from clipboard button for ease of searching

We hope you love Airparts Assistant!

name: AirReview: Airbnb Investment & Hosting Tools
description:
AirReview makes your life easier as an Airbnb host and investor.

With the extension installed, you can do the following:

⚡ See average income for any Airbnb property - just need to click the “Get listing data” button

⚡ Screen guests easier by scanning the reviews they’ve left other hosts. This helps improve your hospitality and avoid negative reviews

⚡ Measure your listing’s revenue performance easier by seeing new charts in the calendar views

🏆 AirReview was featured on Forbes as a must-have hosting tool as well! https://www.forbes.com/sites/sethporges/2017/07/27/all-airbnb-hosts-should-use-this-chrome-extension-for-screening-guests/?sh=7a6319474081

Install the extension & our quickstart guide will guide you the rest of the way

AirReview is a part of Rankbreeze.com. Our mission is to help you build, grow and optimize your guest channels.

Rankbreeze is best known for our Airbnb search rankings & optimization tools, including A/B testing, competitor metrics, and more.

Visit https://rankbreeze.com/airreview to learn more

name: Airstack for Firefox
description:
Airstack for Firefox allows you to save user names and passwords to Airstack while you're logging in to websites.

The URL and credentials will be saved so you can login with one click from Airstack in the future.

You must be logged in to Airstack for Firefox in order to save credentials to Airstack , or have Airstack log you in automatically.

name: Airstory
description:
Put an end to copying and pasting interesting quotes, data points, images and more you find online.

Now with Airstory, you can save your favorite online research as a note. Then drag that note into any space you write online. Your note automatically merges _with_ the source URL included (so you can cite in a snap).

1. Click the Airstory icon in your Chrome browser (or right-click on a page).
2. Highlight and clip a single text snippet or multiple snippets as you scroll down a page. Select any images you want.
3. Tag it for easy future use.
4. Save it as a reusable note right inside Airstory.

Any time you want to make your writing more convincing, open up Airstory and drag one or more notes into your writing.

Great for:
- Business
- Students
- TAs and RAs
- Academics
- Content creators
- Copywriters

Drag notes into Gmail. Google Docs. And anywhere else you write online.

name: AIRTM JWT
description:
Busca JWT en airtm
Solo funciona con cuentas registradas

name: AirVPN Connection Check
description:
Checks regularly for active AirVPN connection and changes the extension icon depending on wether a connection to AirVPN is active or not.

Clicking on the icon will open an information page with the current exit server information. Clicking on the information will copy the exit ip address into the clipboard.

name: Aiveera - Search by Image
description:
To use image search functionality:
Click on a small green icon in top left corner of any image on a website
or
Right click any image and select "Search on Aiveera"

Aiveera will then open a result page, which will contain exact or similar items sold by various vendors. Click on any of the results to get redirected directly to product page at Amazon, Ebay or AliExpress.

name: 怪しい日本語ジェネレーター
description:
選択したテキストを右クリックし、「选択レだ亍キヌ卜カら怪レい日本语を生成」を押すとサイドバーが開き、もう一度そのメニューを押すと生成できます。
メニューを閉じるには右クリックのメニューの怪しい日本語ジェネレーターの「怪レいサ亻ド八\"ーを闭じゑ」から閉じることができます。

（Right-click on the selected text and press "选択レだ亍キヌ卜カら怪レい日本语を生成" to open the sidebar, and press that menu again to generate it.
You can close the menu by right-clicking on the suspicious Japanese generator and selecting "怪レいサ亻ド八\"ーを闭じゑ".）

name: Ajr From Tabs
description:
Assalamu Alaikum!

Verily in the remembrance of Allah, do hearts find ease.

Ajr From Tabs reminds you to remember the most high with each tab you open, either through quick dhikr, salah time reminders or deeper quotes to reflect upon.

All of this whilst still allowing you to keep productive, Ajr from Tab allows you to search the web using your favourite search engines on the same page.

Get Ajr everytime you open a tab. Dhikr, inspirational quotes and prayer times everytime you open a tab.

name: Akakçe Arama Motoru
description:
Firefox'a Akakçe Arama Motoru ekler. Kullanıcının her seferinde önce site ana sayfasını açıp sonra arama yapmasına gerek kalmadan, doğrudan tarayıcı adres çubuğundan arama yapılabilmesini sağlar.

Adres ve arama çubuğu bütünleşik, tek halde kullanıldığında arama kısayolu olarak yazılacak ilk kelime yani anahtar sözcük ak olarak seçilmiştir.

Arama motorunun Firefox'a eklenebilmesi için bu eklenti aslında şart değildir. Az bilinen Firefox özelliği sitedeki arama kutucuğu sağ tık > Bu arama için anahtar kelime ekle...
ile de aynı işlev elde edilebilir. Ama eklenti yapısında olması en azından Firefox Sync ile kullanıcı etkileşimi gerekmeden cihazlara öntanımlı yüklenebilmesini sağlar.

Eklentide kullanılan kod Firefox Android tarafından desteklenmemektedir.

name: Akamai Detector
description:
Unofficial tool. Icon changes color when a site is being accessed via Akamai.

Icon is blue: Akamai network detected.
Icon is orange: Akamai staging network detected.
Icon is gray: Akamai not detected.
Clicking the icon reloads the current page and refreshes the status.

Detection relies on well-known Akamai headers as well as DNS inspection. It is not always possible to detect Akamai!

name: Akamai MFA for Firefox
description:
The Akamai MFA app for Firefox is the companion to the Akamai MFA mobile app for your smart phone.

The Akamai MFA Firefox extension makes it possible to use your phone as a security key authenticator with the Firefox browser.

Akamai MFA makes authentication easy and secure:
- No more passwords or 6-digit codes
- Push to login
- Immune to phishing

Akamai MFA utilizes the standardized FIDO Universal 2nd Factor (U2F) and WebAuthn protocol to provide secure, un-phishable authentication on the web, now in the convenient form factor that is your phone.

Get started in 3 steps:
1. Download the Akamai MFA authenticator app for your smart phone
2. Enable the Akamai MFA Firefox browser extension
3. Scan the QR code using the Akamai MFA app on your phone


==Zero Trust==
Akamai MFA is built on top of an end-to-end verified and encrypted architecture. This means zero trust. We never get access to any of your keys or login information. The keys only live in the app on your phone.

Learn more here: https://www.akamai.com/mfa

name: AKANDI
description: Opens all magnet links automatically in akandi.com so you don't have to copy and paste each link you want to stream.

name: Akari Link Shortener

Shortens URLs using https://waa.ai/

Adds options to the context menu to shorten page/image/or link.

name: アキバエクスプローラー Plugin
description:
この拡張機能をインストールし、対象のアニメグッズオンラインショップの商品ページを表示すると以下の機能が利用できます

・「特典比較」機能
右クリックのメニューまたはブラウザ右上のアイコンをクリックして表示されるメニューから利用できます
特典比較を行うとアニメグッズ店舗特典まとめサイト「アキバエクスプローラー」の特典比較ページを表示します

対象のページ以外でもテキストを選択した状態の場合、右クリックのメニューより以下の機能が利用できます（PCのみ）
・キーワード検索
　　選択したテキストで「アキバエクスプローラー」で検索します
・ISBN/JANコード検索　（ISBNまたはJANコードを選択状態とした場合のみ）
　　選択したISBN/JANコードの「アキバエクスプローラー」の商品比較ページを表示します

・「キーワード検索」機能
ブラウザ右上のアイコンをクリックして表示される検索ボックスで利用できます
「アキバエクスプローラー」で直接グッズ検索ができます
また、キーワード入力の際にグッズ検索に適した独自の予測変換（サジェスト）を表示し、スムーズに検索できます

■特典比較対象ページ
・アニメイト　商品ページ
・ゲーマーズ　商品ページ
・とらのあな　商品ページ
・メロンプックス　商品ページ
・アキバソフマップ　商品ページ
・COMIC ZIN　商品ページ
・三洋堂書店　商品ページ
・まんが王　商品ページ
・書泉　商品ページ
・TSUTAYA　商品ページ（アニメグッズのみ比較に対応しています）
・タワーレコード　商品ページ（アニメグッズのみ比較に対応しています）
・コロムビアミュージックショップ　商品ページ（アニメグッズのみ比較に対応しています）
・セブンネットショッピング　商品ページ（アニメグッズのみ比較に対応しています）
・amazon.co.jp　商品ページ（電子書籍以外のアニメグッズのみ比較に対応しています）
・楽天ブックス　商品ページ（電子書籍以外のアニメグッズのみ比較に対応しています）
・DMM通販　商品ページ（電子書籍以外のアニメグッズのみ比較に対応しています）
※商品の発売日が古い場合(2018年以前)や新しすぎる場合や一部の商品によっては特典比較情報が見つからない場合があります

name: AKIRA Lens
description:
SHOP ANY PHOTO

Shop your favorite looks from Instagram, your favorite blogger sites and more. The AKIRA Lens extension makes any photo immediately shoppable.

The AKIRA Lens, when installed and activated on your Chrome browser, will identify fashion products in photos on any website/blog/social media platform you are browsing. Just click the AKIRA Lens icon in the lower right corner of any photograph to see similar products from shopAKIRA.com. Go get the looks you love!

-----------

Powered by MARKABLE

name: Akita
description:
Akita presents your top visited monetized sites, how much time you’re spending on them, and how much you're contributing (or could contribute) to them. For information on Web Monetization visit https://webmonetization.org/

We submitted this extension as part of the Grant for the Web x DEV.to hackathon. If you're interested, check out our submission post! https://dev.to/esse-dev/akita-get-involved-in-web-monetization-with-or-without-the-price-tag-cd8

We're Open Source! Feel free to check out our repo and even get involved in building Akita: https://github.com/esse-dev/akita

Check out Akita's Privacy Policy here: https://github.com/esse-dev/akita/blob/master/docs/PrivacyPolicy.md

And lastly, check out the project site if you're interested: https://akitaproject.site/

---

If you’re looking to start supporting websites by streaming payment, Akita will give you a good idea of which sites you can directly support through Web Monetization. If you’re already using a Web Monetization payment provider, Akita gives you insight into your contributions to the website by showing you the time spent on the site and the amount of payment streamed as a result.

As Web Monetization becomes more common on websites, you’ll be able to see the evolution through Akita. We hope to see your favourite sites join the Web Monetization community! All of the data collected about your browsing and streamed payments is stored in local browser storage, so all of this information stays in your hands.

Overall, our goal with Akita is to increase Web Monetization exposure and awareness, and to help people understand how Web Monetization fits in with their regular browsing. We want to give people who aren’t using a Web Monetization provider a way to engage in payment streaming. As more Web Monetization providers pop up, users can choose providers that fit their needs based on the browsing data presented by Akita.

name: AkkenCloud CaptureME
description: AkkenCloud CaptureME makes it easy. Quickly source Candidates and Contacts without having to switch between the browser windows or various websites. Eliminate the need to search and find — no more copy and paste. The extension works in the background without interrupting browsing. It will automatically simply indicate with different colors if a matching candidate or contact record exists in AkkenCloud database. Click to view the summary of a record retrieved from the AkkenCloud database or click to add a new record to the database. The extension also offers to view all records if it finds multiple matching records and gives the option to connect the web information to a specific record.

name: Aklamio Cashbar
description:
Bei aklamio kannst du mit deinen Empfehlungen und Einkäufen Geld verdienen. Empfiehl über 10 Millionen Produkte direkt in deinem Browser an deine Freunde weiter und verdiene dabei Geld für Dich selbst. Oder nutze die Cashback-Option und hol dir bis zu 40% zurück bei eigenen Online-Käufen. Keine Vertragsbindung, keine Kosten, Überweisung auf dein Konto schon ab 1 Euro. Beim Surfen Geld verdienen, war noch nie so einfach ;-)!

Die Cashbar informiert dich automatisch, sobald du die Seite eines unserer Partnershops besuchst und du siehst sofort, wie viel du dort verdienen kannst. Mit einem Klick empfiehlst du den Partnershop oder ein Produkt deinen Freunden oder wechselst in den Cashback Modus, um selbst bei deinem Einkauf zu sparen.

aklamio und die aklamio Cashbar sind völlig kostenlos. Die Cashbar erscheint nur, wenn du die Seiten eines aklamio Partnershops besuchst. aklamio erfährt nicht, welche Seiten du sonst besuchst. Die Cashbar wurde von uns so entwickelt, dass sie weder deinen Browser verlangsamt, noch die Benutzung des Browsers in irgendeiner Form negativ beeinträchtigt.

Bei der Nutzung der aklamio Cashbar wird ein kostenloses aklamio Empfehlungskonto erstellt. Die AGB von aklamio findest du hier: AGB

name: Akonter Share links & Page Buttons
description:
Share & homepage buttons in browser toolbar allow sharing any relevant URL to your favorites on akonter Bookmarks or sharing them on Facebook + Twitter + Google+, Reddit, Pinterest, Email App, WhatsApp, linkedin, Tumblr, StumbleUpon, Telegram and more in addition to social homepage buttons in the browser toolbar.

Settings hide & show buttons –> menu >> Add-ons >> options >> uncheck boxes next to icons.

name: Tabber
description:
This is a simple extension allowing you to save all the tabs in a window to a file and load them at a later date.

Usage:
- Saving tabs: click the Export to File button and save the resulting blob
- Loading tabs: paste the JSON into the box and click the Load from File button

name: Акредитатор
description:
Преку Акредитатор дознајте дали медиумот што го читате е дел од регистрите на етички коректни медиуми во државата! Чим ќе посетите веб страна на некој локален медиум, иконата на Акредитатор ќе засвети зелена доколку тој сајт е пронајден во еден од наведените регистри. Со клик на иконата, може да се добијат повеќе информации околку регистрите во кој е запишан тој медиум, како и опција за пријавување на прекршок на етичкиот кодекс.

Со помош на Акредитатор, нудиме дополнителна заштита од можни лажни вести и намалување на дезинформациите! Овој проект е поддржан од Фондот за Иновации и Технолошки Развој.

Акредитатор не ги следи вашите интернет пребарувања и прелистувања, а отворениот код може да се прегледа тука: https://github.com/jovanovski/akreditator-mk

Во овој момент, Акредитатор презема листа на етички медиуми од 2 регистри:
1) Промедиа (ЗНМ/ССНМ) - https://promedia.mk/main
2) ИАБ Македонија - https://www.iab.mk/etichki-kodeks/

name: Aksharakuppy - അക്ഷരക്കുപ്പി
description:
An Easy Method to type Malayalam
Aksharakuppy Supports Multiple function including Text file open, file save and text checker.

Instant Malayalam typing Platform

name: Aksharamukha: Script Converter
description: Aksharamukha aims to provide script conversion (or transliteration) between various scripts within the Indic cultural sphere. You can convert the content of any website from one script to another. These include historic & contemporary scripts.

name: Akte Inspirator
description:
Vervangt de nieuwe tab met een willekeurige historische akte ter inspiratie met genealogische zoekfuncties.
Elke keer als u een nieuw tabblad in uw browser opent zult u verrast worden met een scan van een historische akte. Dit kan een willekeurige akte zijn of een akte waar een bepaalde door u ingestelde naam op voorkomt. Zo wordt elk nieuw tabblad een inspiratie voor verder onderzoek in Nederlandse archieven. Als startpunt kan de bronvermelding dienen die verschijnt als u de muis over het logo van het archief linksonder houdt. De bronvermelding leidt u naar de akte op Open Archieven.

Het zoekvenster verschijnt als u klikt op het logo van de Genealogie Werkbalk (rechtsboven). Nogmaals klikken en het zoekvenster klapt weer in. U kunt zoeken op familienaam in genealogische bronnen op familienaam, zoeken naar scans bij FamilySearch en zoeken naar archiefinstellingen op (plaats)naam.

Via de opties van deze extensie kunt u instellen dat er aktes van een bepaalde familienaam (of door komma gescheiden familienamen) getoond worden.

name: AL MAL
description:
Extends AniList page with data from MyAnimeList:
- Score
- Reviews
- Opening and ending themes
- Additional information (Rating, Broadcast)

name: Aktu Circular

Enable/Disable Logging (Indefinitely or set time)

Open Pi-hole admin in new tab
Display version of Pi-hole
This add-on is ideal when you want to manage Pi-hole instance without disrupting your workflow. Or if you want to give access to Pi-hole to other users of network but web interface is too complicated for them.


This add-on controls Pi-hole via it's own server, which must be installed along Pi-hole instance. Instructions to install server can be found here : https://github.com/Kulda22/alanine. Installation is as easy as Pi-hole installation, we offer install script or docker image.

This extension uses the built-in API to set alarms hence the extension works even if the UI is hidden or your browser gets restarted. This extension offers alarm sound snoozing which snoozes the alarm sound 3 times with 5-minute delay.

You can configure an url for each alarm, that will be open in new tab when the alarm is fired.

Also, in this panel, you can set the background color to display. In the right part of the time/date, you have a bar to modify the font size.

The on/off sound is configured in the panel of toolbar button. You will see a switch.

name: Alfs Buttons
description:
This extension its a little "companion" for the userChrome script "Alfs". It just adds a button with the URL of valid sites (YouTube and Vimeo at the moment), so in that way the script can detect the link to open the video in the sidebar.
So the result is that it does works as a picture in picture solution with the sidebar.

Note that this extension by itself does nothing more that just add a page action button (in URL bar).
The process its clean and simple: The button itself contains a fixed icon file (as any button like that), but when it appears: the 'path' of the icon get added an extra "?start=" followed by the URL of the video watched (the actual Youtube/Vimeo tab). That icon path then is detected by the script and get the URL to send to the sidebar.

This is a way of communicate between the userscript and the "properties" (the URL) of the tab. Its a workaround for send that tab URL to the userChrome script.

For more info & bugs reports, check the repo: https://github.com/thepante/alfs-firefox
Icons used are from Iconscout.com

All credits go to tazeat, who wrote the original version and suggested the change to achieve the current behavior.

name: Alitools shopping assistant
description:
The time for big sales on AliExpress ™ has passed, but many discounts remain. A few reasons to install Alitools and save even more:

AUTOMATIC DISCOUNTS ALREADY IN YOUR CART
- Autochecker of promo codes and coupons helps you save money. We find all the latest AliExpress™ discounts daily and automatically apply the best ones to your cart.

BUY AT A REAL, NOT EXCEEDED PRICE
- Price history checker for the product over the last 3 or 6 months helps to avoid artificial discounts, especially during big sales: 1111 Sale, Black Friday and Cyber Monday. EUR, USD, RUB and 17 more currencies are supported for price tracking.

BUY ONLY FROM RELIABLE SELLERS
- Seller verification helps you avoid bad sellers. A reliable seller will deliver you what you bought right on time, and a bad one — a cat in a bag. Aliexpress seller check works completely automatically.

FIND EXACTLY THE PRODUCTS YOU ARE LOOKING FOR
- Aliexpress search by image helps you to find the item in the picture in one click. No more wasting precious time and looking for a thing you like for a long time.
- Search similar products help you find very similar products. This is useful when you want to find similar product, but slightly different.

CHECK YOUR PRODUCTS BEFORE PURCHASING
- Real product photos from customer feedbacks and product reviews allow you to check product before purchasing.

TRACK THE DELIVERY OF YOUR PRODUCTS
- Alitools will help to track the parcel from China. Postal tracking supports AliExpress Standard Shipping, China Post ePacket and other shipping methods.

=================================

Alitools can synchronize data between computers. For example, at work and at home. To do this, simply create an account.

Alitools extension is fully compatible with other shopping extensions, cashback services and dropshipping tools.

We are always open to communication and will be happy to answer your questions. Contact form: https://alitools.io/en/feedback.

By installing the Alitools Mozilla Firefox extension, you accept the terms of the «User Agreement» and allow redirecting you to the links of the affiliate program AliExpress. User agreement — https://alitools.io/en/info/agreement.

For extension's functions to work and to be able to improve the product, we collect anonymous data about how you use AliExpress and other popular online stores. More details in privacy — https://alitools.io/en/info/policy.

Our extension uses the Google Analytics service to collect statistics on the use of the extension. If you do not want to transfer data, you can find the official Google blocker application or any equivalent. The official Google Analytics blocker from Google — https://tools.google.com/dlpage/gaoptout.

We support the Mozilla Firefox Web Store’s minimum rational use of extensions policy:
1. «http(s)://*/*»
- Collection of information on prices and products on Ali Express and on popular online stores.
- Search for products on AliExpress by pictures on other sites.
- Search for lower priced alternatives on AliExpress for products that you are viewing on other online stores.
2. «Cookies»
- Alitool account authorization.
- Automatic detection of language, currency and country of delivery on AliExpress.
3. «Notifications»
- Price drop alert is sent, when price drops down by 5% or more.
4. «Tabs» and «Web Navigation»
- Browsing history widget.
- Correct functioning of the Ali Tools widget when opening multiple product pages.
- We do not run reverse image search scripts on domains that are prohibited in the settings and save the resources of your computer.
5. «ContextMenus»
- Search product by image from the context menu.
6. «Storage»
- Storing the extension settings.
- Storing the history of recently viewed products.

*Ali, Ali Express and AliExpress is a trademark of Alibaba Group Holding Limited. Use of this trademark is subject to AliExpress Affiliate Program Service Agreement.

- When you search for a product or when you access an external link of a product/store, you will be warned if the seller it is a BAD SELLER, to help you avoiding some future problems. In the back of this add-on, there is a growing database with BAD sellers from aliexpress. Those sellers have done bad things to customers, like (not even sending the order, sending damaged goods, not answering to customers questions in chat, avoiding refund with all costs, tricking/mocking customers, promises in vain and many other things which can result a vary bad attitude). If you had ugly moments with some of the sellers from Aliexpress, just let me know and he will be listed in the BAD SELLER's database.

For this, you must send an e-mail to extension@inframe.ro with the following details:

- Complete name of the store (Case sensitive please, just copy/paste the name)

- Reasons to consider that the seller had a vad behavior against you
- Some screenshots which can evidence the reasons

With this add-on, I just try to change the attitude of bad sellers.

name: All engine search
description:
I know only one search site that provides links to other sites to search for the same text and this is not Google.
If you want to use different search engines to achieve the best search results, you can use this extension to search for the information you are interested in simultaneously in all search engines in your browser.

Do not forget to look into the settings to disable unnecessary search engines.

This extension uses search hints from Google.
Also, due to limitations in the extension APIs, this extension intercepts requests at https://www.google.com/search to send the same search request to other search engines.

Source code of this extension you can find it on Github licensed under MIT:
https://github.com/mm3/all-engine-search

Sometimes this extension stops working correctly, and I don't know why.
After disable/enable extension and update default search engine it will activate again.

name: All Tabs Helper
description:
(Note: ATH versions >= 1.1.1 will not work on Firefox versions < 58.)

Summary

This addon provides a list-style UI for tab management. Designed mainly for high-volume tab users.

The ATH UI can be accessed 3 ways: From the toolbar button popup, in the sidebar, or in the management window (aka "full view" window). Each UI provides 4 different views, also referred to as "menus":

all - All tabs are displayed in tabs bar order, or can be filtered by title and url by typing in the search box.

recent - Lists tabs in order from most recently accessed first.

dups - Duplicate tabs are displayed. (See caveat*)

search - Tabs can be searched by tabs content of loaded tabs.

The screenshots and captioned instructions give a good introduction to using ATH.

Note that ATH is window-centric, ie, menu only applies to the window it is in. The only cross-window support is the ability to move multiple tabs across windows. Demonstration for this is also shown in the screenshots.
(EDIT: ATH now has multi-window functionality, however it is experimental and currrently considered "unsupported". Must be enabled in Options.)

*caveats:

Dup tabs - Note that dup tabs list is generated by searching for tabs with identical URLs. It is possible for two tabs to have the same URL but different content, eg the case where the page is generated based on form or cookie data. Use with awareness when removing tabs.

Reasons for permissions:

Access your data for all websites - Listing and searching tabs - used for the highlighting within the page that is used in the "Search all tabs" feature when the user clicks on a search result in the ATH UI.

Read and modify browser settings - ATH option "Open new tab next to current" changes FF pref

Read the text of all open tabs - Searching tabs content ("search" menu)

Access recently closed tabs - Used to store data that is window oriented, such as window title names

Access browser tabs - Listing and searching tabs

(Note: To be clear, ATH does not modify any part of any page for spoofing, nor scavenge any user input, in order learn any user information, including but not limited to passwords etc.)

Note for Legacy Firefox users: I am making a few concessions to allow ATH to run on Firefox 56 (the last legacy version.) I'd like to make it clear that I am officially not supporting Firefox 56. Some features will not work, or be inapplicable, due to the lack of APIs in Firefox 56. I have only made attempts to allow what will work to work, without breakage, however I am not taking the time to make a customized UI. Thus you may find options, features or context menu items listed that won't apply to you. You may also find bugs which won't be fixed.

In this same paradigm, I cannot guarantee that all future updates of ATH will continue to work on Firefox 56 (or variants.) To be safe you may want to turn off automatic updates and only do updates where you can monitor which is the last version that will work for you.

name: Alldebrid addon
description:
Use this addon to integrate Alldebrid services in your daily navigation.

Features :
Intercept all supported links and redirect to Alldebrid
Quick unlocking of your links with the right-click menu
Display a top bar on suppoted pages to unlock link in one-click
Display a popup on hoster links selection to quickly unlock them
One-click local streaming of video links, player configurable
Highly configurable, enable and disable features or supported websites
Quick process of magnet links and similar with notifications

This extension aims to make it easy to use the Alldebrid service. As so, the extension and Alldebrid service are fully usable during our happy hours, but you'll need an Alldebrid subscription to fully use every features of this extension.

For quick support and bugfixes, please post bugs and feature requests on our support forum

Privacy Notice : This extension use Native Messaging (for the Local Streaming feature) and may send data automatically (for the Action Icons and Links Scan feature) to the Alldebrid service. You must accept the related privacy policies in the extension settings panel before using those features.

More privacy informations are available in the privacy Policies section of this page or at https://alldebrid.com/privacyextension .

name: AllegroTB
description: the add-on adds a shortcut to the web page "https://allegro.pl/" without having to display the bookmarks bar

name: Allegro - sortowanie
description:
Niniejszy plugin blokuje ustawianie sortowania po trafności oraz zapamiętuje sortowanie wybrane przez użytkownika.

Przy uruchomieniu przeglądarki ustawiane jest sortowanie według popularności. Każda zmiana sortowania przez użytkownika jest zapamiętywana i wykorzystywana do czasu aż użytkownik ją zmieni na inną. Sortowanie po trafności wciąż będzie widoczne do wyboru, jednak nie da się go włączyć.

Jakiś czas temu Allegro wprowadziło sortowanie po trafności ustawiając je automatycznie za każdym razem gdy użytkownik zmieni kategorię, uruchomi nowe wyszukiwanie lub skorzysta z linku, który nie zawiera informacji o sortowaniu. Jeżeli podobnie jak autor jesteś zmęczony ciągłym poprawianiem sortowania na takie jakie lubisz, to ten plugin jest dla Ciebie.

name: AlleMon
description:
Wtyczka dla użytkowników serwisu AlleMon.pl – platformy umożliwiającej monitorowanie Allegro i w rezultacie otrzymywanie natychmiastowych powiadomień o nowych aukcjach.

Działanie dodatku polega na umieszczeniu przycisku "Monitoruj w AlleMon" na stronach Allegro z wynikami wyszukiwania. W momencie kliknięcia parametry wyszukiwania przesłane zostają do serwisu AlleMon. Tam na ich podstawie utworzony zostaje monitor ciągle sprawdzający listę wyników w poszukiwaniu nowych ofert, aby natychmiastowo powiadomić o nich użytkownika.

name: Allegro -  Znajdź Niepromowane
description:
Plugin przechodzący do pierwszej oferty niepromowanej na Allegro
Ten plugin umożliwia na łatwe przeskakiwanie do wyników w Allegro które nie są promowane.
Jeżeli na aktualnej stronie znajdują się niepromowane produkty to strona zostanie do nich automatycznie przewinięta.

name: AllHYIPMonitors.com
description:
While you invest in HYIPs you should monitor program on many investment monitors.
You can check all HYIP monitors to find if your program is there and what status they have. But this is big work to do it every day.Some programs place monitoring seals on them sites, but they can leave seals with good standings and remove bad onces. Our system will help you monitor HYIPs on all monitors they are listed on at once and found the best HYIP programs and avoid HYIP Scams. Just enter program domain in search form and you will see seals of all monitors.

name: Allinks
description: As its name refers, Allinks extension extracts all the links from current opened tab, and displays them in a categorized list. It can be used to navigate faster, to find "hidden gems" on any web page, to quickly find website's contact details, such as email address, phone numbers and social media profile links - and more.

name: Allkeyshop - Compare Game Prices
description:
This extension automatically compares video game prices from all leading sellers, including Amazon, Steam, Origin and Uplay and displays the best price available directly on the page.

You can compare all sellers, their payment methods and fees effortlessly all while browsing. Allkeyshop Extension always have the best and most up to date coupons and offers you the chance to participate in regular giveaways and win prizes.

The Allkeyshop Extension does not collect any personal information and is free to use. You can find our Privacy Policy here: https://www.allkeyshop.com/blog/privacy-policy-allkeyshop-com/

Save time and game for longer with this extension, while letting us find the best deals on the games you want!

name: Allmark
description:
It supports cross-browser bookmark synchronization.
It provides options for self-hosted storage, local storage and in-browser storage.

name: Allow 2 Zoom
description: This extension removes the user-scalable and maximum-scale properties from the viewport meta tag in the head of the document. This will allow any device to zoom in in a page, which is specially useful for small devices.

name: Allociné
description:
- Utiliser l’icône de l'extension quand vous êtes sur la page d'un film / d'une série pour faire une recherches sur Allociné. Compatible avec les sites suivants :

* netflix.com
* primevideo.com
* disneyplus.com
* canalplus.com

name: Alluder
description:
A platform built for sharing movie & tv trivia.

The Alluder extension lets you create and view time-stamped trivia posts for any movie or show on Netflix and Hulu.

Create public (viewable by anyone) and private (viewable only to you) posts with the “+” icon. Navigate between posts with the Fast-forward and Rewind arrows. Click the “i” icon to see cast, IMDb trivia, and other information users have added.

To learn more, including our mission, who we are, and what we’re working on next, check us out at Alluder.com.

name: Almonit
description:
Almonit is a plugin for decentralized websites.

Features:

- Resolves .eth links that point to IPFS or Skynet websites.
- Helps in discovering the Dweb using Almonit search engine
- Add an address bar for Dwebsites
- Offers maximum decentralization

name: Alora
description:
Protect your online data privacy

Alora helps you to protect your digital footprint from trackers. Alora also helps you to auto clean cache and cookies. Alora is the first product from the Privoce team. The Privoce project is aimed to provide transparent, secure, user-oriented personal cloud computing solutions for netizen. Alora will serve as the personal data management interface for the Web 3.0 era, an interface between the mature cloud computing infrastructure (cloud storage) and the internet services (apps).

name: Alpaca S.r.l.
description:
Assistenza Tecnica Alpaca S.r.l.

Lo scopo di questa estensione è di comunicare in maniera semplice ed efficente con lo staff di Alpaca S.r.l.. Con un semplice click del maouse si può accedere al Sito web, Facebook, Linkedin e al negozio.

Alpaca S.r.l. società leader nel settore dell’office a Roma, è nel campo da più di 15 anni e ha al suo interno uno staff qualificato e certificato.


Avere personale con altissima professionalità, proveniente direttamente da multinazionali del settore, ci permette di offrire sempre la migliore consulenza, affiancando ciascun cliente nelle scelte, comprendendo a pieno le sue esigenze, trovando con lui le soluzioni migliori e costruendo un rapporto di fiducia.


Un’attenta collaborazione con il cliente ci consente infatti di migliorare la produttività dell’office, offrendo un servizio che punti alla razionalizzazione della spesa e all’abbattimento dei costi di gestione.


Siamo qualificati e certificati grazie a periodici corsi su tutti i maggiori brand, tra cui:
Xerox, Konica Minolta, Toshiba, Kyocera Mita, Brother, Ricoh, Samsung ecc.


Tra i nostri clienti non soltanto grandi aziende, ma anche piccole e medie imprese italiane, ossatura del tessuto economico e produttivo del nostro Paese. Queste realtà imprenditoriali, molte delle quali a conduzione familiare, hanno per loro configurazione bisogni differenti dalle grandi imprese. Noi ci poniamo al loro fianco per offrire soluzioni personalizzate e competitive.


Collaboriamo, inoltre, con diverse Pubbliche Amministrazioni e siamo presenti sul MePA (Mercato Elettronico delle Pubbliche Amministrazioni) grazie al quale possiamo soddisfare le esigenze, anche quelle più specifiche, delle Amministrazioni pubbliche, rispondendo con rapidità alle varie richieste.


Per ampliare sempre di più l’offerta di servizi a disposizione dei nostri clienti, abbiamo ormai da anni stretto una feconda e duratura collaborazione con società che prestano la loro consulenza in vari settori, garantendo così la qualità dei prodotti e una completa assistenza.

name: Alpha Coders
description: Right click on images to be able to quickly categorize them as wallpapers, mobile wallpapers, art, or other types of images, and submit the file to alphacoders.com without first having to save the files to your computer.

name: Alpaka.express для веб-мастеров
description:
Плагин партнерской сети Alpaka.express для веб-мастеров

Быстрый и лёгкий способ создания партнёрских ссылок для платформы Alpaka.
Плагин позволяет получить партнерскую ссылку на любую открытую в Вашем браузере страницу AliExpress!

Для этого необходимо:

Шаг 1. Установите дополнение для Вашего браузера;

Шаг 2. Перейдите на сайт Алиэкспресс
Дополнение работает только на сайте Алиэкспресс. Чтобы начать работу, перейдите на aliexpress.com или aliexpress.ru.

Шаг 3. Введите свой ключ
Перед тем, как начать генерировать ссылки, нужно ввести ваш персональный ключ. Вы можете его получить в кабинете Alpaka в разделе “Инструменты” на вкладке “Дополнения для браузера”.

Шаг 4. Перейдите на страницу товара и создайте короткую ссылку.
Перейдите на страницу товара и нажмите на иконку плагина. Во всплывающем окне укажите креатив или группу, к которому относится создаваемая ссылка, и нажмите “Получить ссылку”. Сформированная партнерская ссылка готова к использованию!

Шаг 5. Опубликуйте ссылку
Нажмите на ссылку, и она автоматически скопируется в буфер обмена.
Опубликуйте ссылку на выбранной площадке. Ссылка появится в личном кабинете, и вы сможете видеть статистику по ней. Чтобы создать новую ссылку, перейдите на новую страницу Алиэкспресс или обновите текущую.

Шаг 6. Дерзайте!
Если что-то пойдет не так, задайте вопрос в личном кабинете Alpaka в разделе
“Поддержка” — мы всегда рады вам помочь.


Наш сайт: https://alpaka.express

Условия участия для вебмастеров:
https://alpaka.express/terms/

Политика конфиденциальности:
https://alpaka.express/confidential/


Устанавливая расширение "Alpaka.express для веб-мастеров", вы принимаете условия «Пользовательского соглашения».

AlphaDrive for Mac

name: AlphaRune
description:
Browser extension to convert the Latin alphabet to and from runes

Supports the following rune sets:
* Elder Futhark
ᛒᚱᛟᚹᛊᛖᚱ ᛖᚲᛊᛏᛖᚾᛊᛁᛟᚾ ᛏᛟ ᚲᛟᚾᚹᛖᚱᛏ ᛏᚺᛖ ᛚᚨᛏᛁᚾ ᚨᛚᛈᚺᚨᛒᛖᛏ ᛏᛟ ᚨᚾᛞ ᚠᚱᛟᛗ ᚱᚢᚾᛖᛊ

* Anglo-Saxon (Futhorc)
ᛒᚱᚩᚹᛋᛖᚱ ᛖᛉᛏᛖᚾᛋᛁᚩᚾ ᛏᚩ ᚳᚩᚾᚹᛖᚱᛏ ᛏᚻᛖ ᛚᚪᛏᛁᚾ ᚪᛚᛈᚻᚪᛒᛖᛏ ᛏᚩ ᚪᚾᛞ ᚠᚱᚩᛗ ᚱᚢᚾᛖᛋ

* Younger Futhark (Long-branch)
ᛒᚱᚢᚢᛋᛁᚱ ᛁᚴᛋᛏᛁᚾᛋᛁᚢᚾ ᛏᚢ ᚴᚢᚾᚠᛁᚱᛏ ᛏᚼᛁ ᛚᛅᛏᛁᚾ ᛅᛚᛒᚼᛅᛒᛁᛏ ᛏᚢ ᛅᚾᛏ ᚠᚱᚢᛘ ᚱᚢᚾᛁᛋ

* Younger Futhark (Short-twig)
ᛓᚱᚢᚢᛌᛁᚱ ᛁᚴᛌᛐᛁᚿᛌᛁᚢᚿ ᛐᚢ ᚴᚢᚿᚠᛁᚱᛐ ᛐᚽᛁ ᛚᛆᛐᛁᚿ ᛆᛚᛓᚽᛆᛓᛁᛐ ᛐᚢ ᛆᚿᛐ ᚠᚱᚢᛙ ᚱᚢᚿᛁᛌ

* Medieval (Futhork)
ᛒᚱᚮᚥᛌᛂᚱ ᛂᛪᛐᛂᚿᛌᛁᚮᚿ ᛐᚮ ᛍᚮᚿᚠᛂᚱᛐ ᛐᚼᛂ ᛚᛆᛐᛁᚿ ᛆᛚᛔᚼᛆᛒᛂᛐ ᛐᚮ ᛆᚿᛑ ᚡᚱᚮᛘ ᚱᚢᚿᛂᛌ

* Ogham
᚛ᚁᚏᚑᚃᚄᚓᚏ ᚓᚕᚈᚓᚅᚄᚔᚑᚅ ᚈᚑ ᚉᚑᚅᚃᚓᚏᚈ ᚈᚆᚓ ᚂᚐᚈᚔᚅ ᚐᚂᚚᚆᚐᚁᚓᚈ ᚈᚑ ᚐᚅᚇ ᚃᚏᚑᚋ ᚏᚒᚅᚓᚄ᚜
[Ogham is Irish and runes are Germanic, but the functionality is included regardless]

name: AlphaX
description: AlphaX is automatic trading on Olymp Trade option platform.

name: Alpheios Reading Tools
description: The Alpheios Reading Tools enhance any browser page with access to dictionaries, grammars and other resources for reading Latin, Ancient Greek, Classical Arabic and Persian texts.

name: Already Seen
description:
This extension will help you quickly identify new elements on the sites you visit frequently. This is particularly helpful for lists or table rows, like a list of offers that appear daily. You will no longer be bothered by repeated offers, and will be able to always focus on the new ones only.

To start monitoring a page, select some text, right click, and select "Already Seen".

name: Alt New Tab
description:
Alt+N: Insert after the last tab
Alt+Shift+N: Insert after the current tab

You can change on the manage extension shortcuts page on Firefox 66 and later.

name: Alt or not
description:
Alt or not is a browser extension / add-on for Chrome, Firefox, and Edge. Easily see which images include alt text or not on Twitter (also supports GIF) and TweetDeck, and get a warning when posting images without alt text.

It's often difficult or cumbersome to tell if images have alternative text on Twitter or TweetDeck. Alternative (or alt) text is used to describe images for those who can't see the image, making them more accessible.

This extension shows which images are missing alternative text, and displays the alt text below the images when available.

The extension also warns users when images in a tweet have no alt text when tweeting, and you can choose to disable the button entirely when alt text is missing, requiring you to add descriptions before you can tweet.

Version 1.1 introduces an option to hide tweets from accounts using an NFT profile pic.

Note: on TweetDeck descriptions are not displayed on GIFs.

name: Alt Tab Page
description:
Alt Tab Page allows the user to select their preferred load page for new tabs and defaults to Google's when not in use.

Note(s):
The plugin can not use URLs like about:about .

name: Alt Tong
description:
Promptly change 'Accept-Language' HTTP header to a configurable string.
Inspired by Dan Callahan's "Quick Accept-Language Switcher".
Managed through tabs context menu (its label) and the extension options page.

name: AltConSys Alerter EBUS
description:
Alerts you to corresponding comments or offers while looking at items on eBay. Some alerts display the bitcoin logo. If you click on them you're taken to an off-site forum where you find comments and deals taking place, not authorized by eBay.

While viewing items on eBay a small browser alert box may pop up with a link to a corresponding comment or offer relating to the item you're viewing. Anybody can leave these comments/offers using our matching extension, the "AltConSys Inserter". After you click the link, a separate window will open into the corresponding topic on a "Discourse" forum.
Those alerts only show when an actual link exists. They get triggered by entering the listing or by swiping the mouse in a checkmark motion on a list of listings. Please see the video on how this works.
This "unauthorized, overlaying commenting system" may potentially break the isolation imposed by eBay on their buyers and sellers. For more please read the intro on AltConSys.com .
For off-eBay deals please use AltConSys' own specially designed Bitcoin wallet with fair arbitration by AltConSys. Never pay directly with Bitcoin!

name: AltConSys Inserter EBUS
description:
ATTENTION: YOU MUST BE ON A PRODUCT LISTING ON eBAY FOR THIS TO WORK!!!

Enter any comments to any listing on eBay. They are stored in a forum off-site but the "Alerter" will find and and alert you to them while you're browsing the listings - as though they are part of the listing itself.
Leave alternative deals, comments about seller/product, your contact info or anything else eBay prohibits you from sharing in order to isolate buyers / sellers. Please watch our video on how it's done!

name: Alternatives To Big Tech
description:
Tired of being kicked around by big corporations?

Big corporate censorship is common. An ever increasing number of companies use censorship to harm others. These practices take many forms. They can stop you from earning a living or participating in the digital public square.

The Alternatives To Big Tech extension helps you fight back against corporate censorship!

It notifies you when you visit a website with a history of censorship. Then offers alternative companies for you to consider.

Stop the censorship and hit the big guys where it hurts most – their wallets.

name: AltCopy
description:
Developer tools are certainly more powerful when some text can not be selected directly but they are less convenient in some frequent cases. In addition to "title" and "alt" attributes, the following properties are tried:
chosen option of <select> element,
value of <input> form element that is suitable for date, time, color, range, etc.
or its placeholder,
text of an element when selection is suppressed through CSS,
selected text, link target, or image source if nothing "better" is available.
Granting clipboard permission in add-on preferences makes copy action more reliable,

name: Alter
description:
- Alter tries to redirect you to privacy-friendly alternatives.
- As of now it redirects YouTube, Twitter, Reddit, Instagram and Medium links to Invidious, Nitter, Teddit, Bibliogram and Scribe instances respectively.
- It is completely free and open-source software.
- The source code can be found at, https://github.com/w3bdev1/alter

name: Altmail ~Be Awesome
description:
With Altmail,
✅ Get all your informational emails - newsletters, deals, digests and updates - at one place.
✅ Enjoy the content you love and block the rest.
✅ De-clutter your primary inbox.

________________________________________________
There’s a hidden treasure in your inbox waiting to be explored. All those newsletters and blog updates, all those deals, all those Medium digests and LinkedIn alerts, contain keys to becoming a better version of yourself.

Meet Altmail, a new home for all your newsletter, deal, digest, and update emails.

# Spend less time organising, more time acquiring knowledge
Altmail uses machine learning algorithms to automatically sort emails into right categories, so you won’t have to create rules, labels, and folders. You can use that time to read to through that interesting article on Medium.

# Declutter your inbox without missing out on information
We have specially designed an email address, which you can use for any subscription services like newsletters or online shopping website. This way you don’t have to give away your personal email address to anyone, and at the same time, you can subscribe for content you love or sign up for an account on your favourite online services!

# Follow your interests, not rules
Altmail will organise your emails so that they are ready for reading. If you don’t like any email then you can block it with a click of a button - FOREVER. We think your time is much better spent reading that design tutorial you subscribed for to help you score that promotion you’ve been waiting for.

# Btw, we haven't forgotten your primary inbox
Of course, we haven’t forgotten your existing inbox. We created Altmagic to automagically forward all the current subscription emails from your current inbox to Altmail. It will help you clean up your inbox at the speed of light, in fact without deleting a single email. Sounds magical, right?

# A new home deserves a new interface
The current user interface of email clients is not designed for efficiency, we found it to be the major reason why we have cluttered inboxes in the first place. That is why with Altmail we are introducing an innovative and beautiful interface which is focused on providing a unique reading experience and keyboard navigation shortcuts. Just a warning though once you use that navigation you won’t like any other email clients. Don’t say we didn’t warn you. ;)

name: Altruisto.com
description:
Raise money for the world's most effective charities through your everyday online shoppings with no extra costs.

You can start helping people in extreme poverty with no extra effort or costs. Just install an extension, and when you buy something online, people living in severe poverty will get medicines, bed nets, or financial aid. There are no extra costs for you (the charity donation is covered by our partner stores).

We’ve partnered with online stores (including Ebay, Aliexpress, Etsy, Microsoft) to create a unique loyalty program. For every purchase you make in one of our partners’ stores, portion of the money goes to extremely effective, research-backed charities. That way, users can support great causes with no costs, and shops gain clients strongly incentivized to buy from them and not their competition.

It works with 1000+ shops including Ebay, Barnes & Noble, Aliexpress, and Etsy. For every $4.85 raised for Against Malaria Foundation two people are protected from malaria (via bed nets) and for every $1.19 raised for Schistosomiasis Control Initiative, one child gets a year supply of medicine.


Everyone wins!


---
How does it work?
---
When you visit one of our partners’ stores online, you will see a special button saying "start raising money". After clicking that button, you will be asked to confirm your choice, and you will then be redirected back to the store. From now on, when you buy something, Altruist receives a commission (usually 1-6%) and donates it to carefully chosen charities.

The charities we've chosen to support have been recommended by GiveWell.org - an organization that does in-depth research into how well charities do what they are supposed to do and chooses the best ones. As a result, the charities we support are exceptional at improving the lives of people living in extreme poverty. Thanks to that, you don't have to spend your time verifying if the charity you want to support is good, do their job well, doesn't pay ridiculous salaries to the founders, etc.

Selected charities are evidence-backed, thoroughly vetted, and underfunded.

Because of all that you can be sure that the money they receive from your online shoppings is used to do as much good as possible. Also, because the charities are so efficient with their funds, every small purchase in Altruisto's partners' shops makes a real difference in someone's life.

name: Altt.me
description:
Расширение автоматически исправляет неработающие ссылки на Telegram на те, которые открываются без VPN. Магия! (Эта магия поддерживается на большистве сайтов, но пока не на всех. Мы работаем над этим)
А ещё – с ним можно быстро конвертировать неработающую ссылку в работающую: особенно удобно будет редакторам, блогерам, авторам и сммщикам.

Расширение не собирает, не записывает и не отправляет никакую информацию – ваши данные в безопасности.

Подробнее о сервисе – на https://altt.me.

name: AltYes
description:
AltYes - Share your experiences and monetize them.

AltYes makes it possible for you to share things on various social networks, including Hive giving you the ability to obtain some 'crpyto' without having to know all the ins and outs of programming. A user friendly, simple and straight forward extension to help you grow and potentially earn some extra income for doing what you already do online by sharing your life, expertise and experiences with the world.

FULLALT.com - "www is our niche".

name: Always Desktop Version
description:
Frustrated when mobile sites don't redirect?
This extension redirects some mobile sites to their desktop equivalents. At the moment, it supports Twitter and Wikipedia. If you don't want one of the sites to redirect, just disable it in the options page.

name: Always In Container
description:
With this extension installed. Every time you try to open a page out of a container, the extension will ask you to choose a container. It would be helpful if you want every page contained.

Notice

This extension is targeted to be simple. No feature requests would be accepted.

Credit

This extension used some source codes from following open source projects:
Multi-Account Containers
Facebook Container
which were created and developed by Mozilla and its contributors.

Translation:
Polish (by ikurek)

name: Always On Top for Video Tag
Always on Top
description:
Very simple "Always on top" extension implements equally simple functionality - it allows you to add "Always on top" style for your Firefox window.

Usage: browser toolbar button or Ctrl+Shift+F7 shortcut

Starting from Firefox 57 it requires additional application

If you want to donate my work in any way, please contact me by email

name: Always Open Privately
description:
Firefox add-on to always open specific websites in private windows.

This Firefox add-on provides the functionality to configure a whitelist of domain names. If while browsing a domain name matches a domain on the whitelist, this add-on will try to prevent Firefox from loading the website in a non-private window, open a new private window and load the website there.

Because of how webextension add-ons work, it is not always possible to prevent Firefox from loading a website. However, this add-on will always open a new private window and load the website there.

When opening the new private window, utm_campaign parameters are stripped from the URL to add a little more privacy.

Usage

Always Open Privately needs the permission to run in private windows. This setting may be set manually in the add-on manager in Firefox.

In the settings panel, add one domain per line.

Permissions

The add-on requires several permissions. It just asks for the absolutely required permissions.

webNavigation: to get notified about new URLs (new site visits)
tabs: to get the URL to be opened
activeTab: to stop loading a website
all_urls: to be able to intercept requests to every possible domain
storage: to save add-on settings

name: Always Preview (obsolete)
description:
This add-on will be no longer needed in Future Firefox:
https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=773942

name: Always Right
description:
New tabs should always open to the immediate right of the current tab. And now they will.

Usually when I open new tabs, it's not because a lightning bolt struck, and I must switch from my current activity to a new and different one. Most of the time the new tab is directly related to what I'm currently doing, so when Firefox opens tabs at the end of 50 tabs, they're almost guaranteed to be far from the tabs I was working with. I then find myself hunting around for the tabs I was just at, sometimes trying long and RSI-inducing drag-and-drop operations to regroup things.

I should be able to continue working with the software in the way that my mind expects it to work.

So maybe this isn't for you, but I'm Always Right.

Known issues with WebExtension version (2.0.4 and up), due to limitations of WebExtension implementation in Firefox:

* Tab strip scrolls to position of new tab, instead of staying in same place

* With lots of tabs, the scrolling becomes visually annoying

You can report bugs, request features and help build Always Right on Github: https://github.com/autonome/Always-Right/

Icon: "right" by Eliricon from the Noun Project

name: Always active Window (Always Visible)
description:
This extension protects against web pages tracking the activity state of the page. Some websites use this track to only offer services when the tab is active. By installing this extension a small script is injected into every webpage which overwrites the "document.visibilityState", and "document.hidden" properties to pretend the tab is always in the active state (document.visibilityState = 'visible' and document.hidden = false).

This is useful for the webpages that check your visibility state before loading resources like many music webpages. By installing this extension even if the page is opened in the background page, the player will start immediately like the page is loaded on an active tab.

Supported Trackings:
document.mozHidden (only on Firefox browser)
document.webkitHidden (only on Chromium browsers)

Supported Events:
1. visibilitychange
2. webkitvisibilitychange (only on Chromium browsers)
3. mozvisibilitychange (only on Firefox browser)
4. blur (some websites require the user to keep the tab focused)
5. mouseleave (some websites use this method to make sure the user pointer is inside the window)

Notes:
At the moment there is no exception list, so the extension injects the script on all HTTP and local HTML pages. You need to disable the extension from the options page if you need to bypass the default always active behavior. On Chromium browsers, you can also limit the script injection to a few hostnames by using the right-click context menu item called "This Can Read and Change Site Data" over the browser action button.

name: Always Twitter Mobile
description: This extension will capture requests to twitter.com and redirect any requests to the desktop version to the much more usability friendlier mobile version.

name: AlwaysKillSticky
description:
On sites/pages where it’s enabled, AlwaysKillSticky finds all elements whose position CSS property has a computed value of either ‘sticky’ or ‘fixed’, and removes those elements.

AlwaysKillSticky can work in blacklist mode (only killing stickies on sites you specify) or whitelist mode (killing stickies except on sites you specify).

AlwaysKillSticky also optionally allows fine-grained control of which sites and pages stickies are killed on (e.g., if you want to kill stickies on all sites on a domain, or if you want to exclude specific paths of a site).

name: AlwaysGonnaGiveYouUp
description: Dieses Addon blockiert das YouTube Video "Never Gonna Give You Up" und zeigt dir eine warnung dass du getrollt wurdest.

Amadont
description: Just in case you have an online shopping addiction.

name: amagone - remove amazon from search results
description:
Tired of amazon cluttering your search results?

amagone adds a button to your browser toolbar. Clicking the button switches between showing amazon in search results or not showing amazon results.

name: Amazing Fields for Trello
description: The extension is for use with the Amazing Fields powerup for Trello. It modifies the Trello UI to hide and show various items as needed based upon what the user has configured to enable in the powerup.

name: Amat.su/kaze!
description:
Browser extension for the URL shortening service, Amat.su/kaze!

Amat.su is a simple URL shortening service like bit.ly and the like themed after the character of same name from Kantai Collection, a popular Japanese game.

Source available on Github.

I wrote this plugin in order to study Javascript and for my own usage.
